original_text: My covenant with him was one of life and peace, and I gave them to him. It was a covenant of fear, and he feared me. He stood in awe of my name.
korean_text: 레위와 세운 나의 언약은 생명과 평강의 언약이라 내가 이것을 그에게 준 것은 그로 경외하게 하려 함이라 그가 나를 경외하고 내 이름을 두려워하였으며

sentences.original_text: My covenant with him was one of life and peace
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 맺은 내 언약은 생명과 평강이었고

sentences.original_text: and I gave them to him.
It was a covenant of fear,
He stood in awe of my name.
